admissions.title: Start Your Application
admissions.content: Applying to KCTCS Online is easy, and we’ll be with you at every step of the way. So let’s get this journey started!

admissions.title: Enrollment Checklist
admissions.content: Unlock the door to your future with KCTCS Online! Our enrollment process is designed to be smooth and hassle-free, with our support team ready to assist you every step of the way. Let's kickstart your educational journey together – it all begins here!

admissions.title: Admissions Guidelines
admissions.content: Ready to start? Our admissions guidelines are designed to make your journey seamless, whether you're a beginner or transferring. Simply follow our clear instructions and submit your documents to start your educational adventure!

student-support-services.title: Accessibility Services
student-support-services.content: Find out what you need to know about disability services in college.

student-support-services.title: Cultural Diversity
student-support-services.content: Our diverse student body means you'll have a culturally enriching experience.

student-support-services.title: Student Success Hub
student-support-services.content: Applying to KCTCS Online is easy, and we’ll be with you at every step of the way. So let’s get this journey started!
student-support-services.url: The Hub supports students with first year orientations, peer mentoring and tutoring, and many other services that will enhance success at BCTC.

tuition.title: Financial Aid Checklist
tuition.content: Whether you’re a high school student, a returning student or just looking to take a class on the side, following these steps will make your financial aid experience easy!

tuition.title: Applying for Aid
tuition.content: We offer a wide range of financial aid programs. You must first complete the Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA) to determine what types of financial aid you qualify for. Below are some steps that will help you complete the process with ease.

tuition.title: Scholarships
tuition.content: Complete ONE online scholarship application to be considered for all Scholarships! Our Scholarship Application has two parts: the (1) KCTCS General Application and the (2) BCTC Conditional Application.

tuition.content: Whether you’re a high school student, a returning student or just looking to take a class on the side, following these steps will make your financial aid experience easy!

tuition.title: Applying for Aid
tuition.content: We offer a wide range of financial aid programs. You must first complete the Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA) to determine what types of financial aid you qualify for. Below are some steps that will help you complete the process with ease.

tuition.title: Scholarships
tuition.content: Complete ONE online scholarship application to be considered for all Scholarships! Our Scholarship Application has two parts: the (1) KCTCS General Application and the (2) BCTC Conditional Application.

admissions.title: Start Your Application
admissions.content: Applying to KCTCS Online is easy, and we’ll be with you at every step of the way. So let’s get this journey started!

admissions.title: Enrollment Checklist
admissions.content: Unlock the door to your future with KCTCS Online! Our enrollment process is designed to be smooth and hassle-free, with our support team ready to assist you every step of the way. Let's kickstart your educational journey together – it all begins here!

admissions.title: Admissions Guidelines
admissions.content: Ready to start? Our admissions guidelines are designed to make your journey seamless, whether you're a beginner or transferring. Simply follow our clear instructions and submit your documents to start your educational adventure!

student-support-services.title: Accessibility Services
student-support-services.content: Find out what you need to know about disability services in college.

student-support-services.title: Cultural Diversity
student-support-services.content: Our diverse student body means you'll have a culturally enriching experience.
